amendment.description: To provide for funding for wind energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3812 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 42. Record Vote Number: 61.

action.text: Amendment SA 3812 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2429-2431; text: CR S2429) To provide for funding for wind energy.
